DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Positive Action Program Hawaii Schools
DOC.detailed_description: This project : 1 ) evaluate efficacy comprehensive , multi-grade , multi-year program , Positive Action program ( PA ) design reduce student problem behavior ( include drug use violence ) , disciplinary referral suspension , academic underachievement ; 2 ) evaluate effect program presumed/theoretical mediator variable ; 3 ) ass change mediator variable actually mediate effect program behavior school performance . The Hawaiian school district agree implement randomized trial PA program . We randomly assign school PA control condition strata match multiple indicator risk . PA school receive full PA program four year ( 2002-03 2005-06 school year ) . This include material student ( grade ) , family , teacher , principal , plus community kit ; train teacher interested staff ; continuous technical support monitor PA staff person . Data behavior academic achievement obtain school archival record student year , appropriate several year prior study . Students grade 1 3 2001-02 school year parent teacher also follow project survey every year . The subject population contain equal portion male female , proportionate number major ethnic group Oahu ( Hawaiian part-Hawaiian , white , Asian , Other ) . Analyses test program effect hypothesize mediate variable outcomes , hypothesize mediational pathway .
